relation: For fun we play board games on weekends, play football, video games, and watch TV together.
The dorm life is very enjoyable. I get along with everyone throughout the dorm, and everyone interacts with each other.
This school is great with its teaching caliber.

In my own opinion, I would rate Wesley College a 8-10. I enjoy the campus its self with its many activities it has set for the students. I also like the professor's they are very intact with there teaching.
pageTitle: Wesley College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {14731=Wesley College is great for all students, but especially for those that come from a small school. I came from a high school with a graduating class of 100 people and I needed a small campus. When I have class it is a 17:1 ration, and usually it isn't even that big. Although it is a very diverse campus and can work for many different people., 150025=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 726=Interested in a 17:1 student to professor ratio? Interested in a small community within a large College/University mainstream? Interested in competing in football games amongst others? Come to Wesley!!}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Melissa from Newark, DE 09/22/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 11 out of 11 people found this review useful. 2 of 39 Categories Comments Great for these types of students I think any student who really wants to learn, especially in a small environment, would work best here. I like learning in smaller classes, and I like having conversations with the professors and ongoing debates. Tips for prospective students Check the campus. Go on a tour, and talk to some of the teachers and professors. If you know the major you want to go into, talk to the professors of some of the classes you'll be taking especially. It's a great school, but everybody is different. Bang for the buck I love Wesley, and it is a private college. However, without ANY scholarships, it is a lot of money, even for in-state students I know. It's over $15,000 unincluding if you're living there. But, they offer all types
